article_title: More Middle Americans visit Mexico for low-cost medical care

article_metadata.description: NOGALES, Sonora, Mexico – A slew of dental offices and pharmacies line a block of shops selling metal lawn sculptures shaped like donkeys, and handcrafted red and white Mexican dresses
article_metadata.author:
ALEXA D’ANGELO
Cronkite News
